summary: Changes the Dawnguard loading screens to give tips that  Sheogorath, god of madness would.
descriptionHtml:
It\'s finally here! I just got the Creation Kit to work with DLCs, so I made this! If you are unfamiliar with the Uncle Sheo series of mods, it was started by a modder named Tumbleworld, and taken up by me. (Original mod here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12234) They are just mods to spice up the loading screens and turn them into the thoughts of a madman.

My uncle Sheo Mods:
Phenderix Loading Screens- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24884
Climates of Tamriel Loading Screens- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24865
JaySuS Loading Screens- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24780
Hearthfire Loading Screens  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31820
**NEW** Frostfall Loading Screens **NEW** http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33738
**NEW** Dragonborn Loading Screens **NEW** http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36987/?
author: Nonmeatbag
